name: Thomas the Tank Engine & Friends: Thomas's Big Race
overview: Thomas the Tank Engine & Friends 2, also titled Thomas's Big Race, was an game released in 1993 and a sequel to Thomas the Tank Engine & Friends. The aim of the game is to compete and win races with Thomas or one of his friends. The gameplay is to race against another player. There is an option to either race against the computer or a friend. Players can choose to play as either Thomas, Percy, Gordon, Bill, Ben, Toby, James or Bertie the Bus. There are four courses: Main Line, Postal Run, Waterway, or Wood Glade.
